comment.author: 47524421@N08
comment._content:
Bell P-39Q-10-BE Airacobra 42-20869. 

"...Won 1946 Thompson Trophy race at 373.908 mph with 'Tex' Johnston at the controls.  Sold to Ed Maloney in 1960 and reregistered as N9284 and displayed in his Planes of Fame museum.  Bought by Mike Carroll in 1967 to be use in an  attempt on world piston-engined speed record.  Crashed August 10, 1968, killing Mike Carroll...." (J. Baugher)
